com.zcking.furyengine.engine.objects

Class Particle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zcking.furyengine.engine.objects.GameObject
      • com.zcking.furyengine.engine.objects.Particle

  • public class Particle
extends GameObject
    Implements a simple particle that can be used by an implemented IParticleEmitter for particle effects.

      • Particle

        public Particle(Mesh mesh,
                org.joml.Vector3f speed,
                long ttl,
                long updateTextureMillis)
        Constructs a new particle.
        Parameters:
        mesh - The mesh for the particle game object.
        speed - The velocity of the particle.
        ttl - The time-to-live for the particle (in milliseconds).
        updateTextureMillis - The texture update rate for the particle (in milliseconds).
